title: Mode to build with asserts turned off
body_html: Right now, we always build all builds, even optimized production builds, with asserts turned on. Asserts are not free, and can affect performance (even though most of our asserts are "cheap" checks, they add up.) We should be able to build with asserts turned off. Even better: distribute ABI-compatible libtorch.so and libtorch_debug.so, the latter of which has asserts enabled.
